attributes.action: Reopen the Lincolnshire Loop Line - Lincoln to Boston
attributes.additional_details: To reinstate and take a feasibility investigation to study the required figure in which to reinstate part if not the whole of the line to enable better transport after the last train departed from Woodhall Junction at the very end of 1970. To also look at easier and more quicker ways of restoring this railway line and to also see if it's a possible option of which to do this in the future.
